title: Breville Presents "Meat & Greet" with Chef Seamus Mullen
description:
Chef Seamus Mullen cares about what food goes into his body. He invited us into his home to learn a bit more about the health benefits of grass-fed beef and to share a bountiful menu of delicious summer dishes.

asset.author: breville
asset.hookText:
Chef Seamus Mullen cares about what food goes into his body. He invited us into his home to learn a bit more about the health benefits of grass-fed beef and to share a bountiful menu of delicious summer dishes.

"I am passionate about good food, good ingredients, and eating well. So I invited some friends over to my apartment in Brooklyn to enjoy some quality grass-fed beef and to talk about the correlations between food and health." - Chef Seamus Mullen

For more about Breville, visit http://www.brevilleusa.com.

To read more about Chef Mullen's take on grass-fed beef, read his article on Food Thinkers:
http://www.foodthinkers.com/articles/escewing-the-fat

Subscribe to our YouTube Channel:
http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=breville

Like us on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/brevilleusa

Pin us on Pinterest:
http://pinterest.com/brevilleusa/

Follow us on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/brevilleusa

See Chef Mullen's book, Hero Food: How Cooking with Delicious Things Can Make Us Feel Better:
http://www.amazon.com/Seamus-Mullens-Hero-Food-Delicious/dp/1449407587/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1365798472&sr=8-1&keywords=hero+foods+by+seamus+mullen

Breville has a new website check it out!
http://foodthinkers.com/
